text: IK Heros is a sports club in Smedjebacken in Sweden. It was established in 1915. The club has bandy and track and field athletics sections. It earlier even played soccer. The men's bandy team has played 11 seasons in the Swedish top division. between 1940 and 1965-1966. The men's soccer team has played five seasons in the Swedish third division.Sweden 3rd level alltime table == References == ==Other websites== * Bandy * Track and field athletics Category:1915 establishments in Sweden Category:Athletics clubs in Sweden Category:Bandy clubs in Sweden Category:Swedish football clubs
title: IK Heros
